name: Black Knight Set
location_text: Dropped by Black Knights

name: Hornsent Set
location_text: Dropped by Hornsent after defeating Miquella's Companions

name: Circlet of Light
location_text: On the ground after defeating the final boss

name: Common Soldier Set
location_text: Droped from Common Soldiers in Castle Ensis

name: Crucible Hammer-Helm
location_text: Dropped from Crusible Knight Devonia

name: Ascetic's Set
location_text: Dropped from Curseblade enemies

name: Dancer's Set
location_text: Dropped by Dancer of Ranah

name: Dane's Set
location_text: Found under a waterfall under Bonny Village

name: Death Knight Set
location_text: Found on corpse in Darklight Catacombs

name: Death Mask Helm
location_text: Drops from a Fire Knight in the Cathedral section of Shadow Keep after draining the water

name: Divine Beast Head
location_text: Found after defeating Divine Beast Dancing Lion

name: Divine Beast Set
location_text: Dropped by Divine Beast Warriors

name: Divine Bird Set
location_text: Droppped by Divine Bird enemies

name: Iron Rivet Set
location_text: Dropped by Red Bear

name: Pelt of Ralva
location_text: Dropped by Ralva the Great Red Bear

name: Fire Knight Set
location_text: Dropped from Fire Knights

name: Freyja's Set
location_text: Found in Shadow Keep after Freyja leaves or after the ally fight if you gave her Ansbach's letter

name: Gaius's Set
location_text: Purchased at Roundtable Hold after defeating Command Gaius

name: Gravebird Set
location_text: Each piece dropped in different places

pieces.location_text: Found on by elevator at Spiral Rise Site of Grace, end game area
Found at cliff under Belurat near some Gravebirds
Found north of Temple Town Ruins Site of Grace, provides jump attack bonus
Found south of the Pillar Path Waypoint Site of Grace
Found in swamp just south of Shadow Keep

name: Greatjar
location_text: Found in Belurat Gaol

name: Night Set
location_text: Found in Bonny Gaol

name: Solitude Set
location_text: Dropped by Blackgaol Knight

name: High Priest Set
location_text: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers

name: Horned Warrior Set
location_text: Dropped by Horned Warriors

name: Igon's Set
location_text: Defeat Igon or return to dueling drakes location after defeating Bayle

name: Imp Head (Lion)
location_text: Dropped by Lion Head Imps

name: Highland Warrior Set
location_text: Northwest of Ravine North Site of Grace in the forest. Gloried Attire shown.

pieces.location_text: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is slightly south-west of the large stone, on a corpse by a ledge.

name: Messmer Soldier Set
location_text: Dropped by Messmer Soldiers

name: Messmer's Set
location_text: Purchased at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

name: Oathseeker Knight Set
location_text: Found on ledge outside the Church of Benediction

name: Rakshasa Set
location_text: Dropped by Rakshasa

name: Rellana's Set
location_text: Purchased at Roundtable Hold after defeating Rella Twin Moon Knight

name: Salza's Hood
location_text: Dropped by Fire Knight at the west exit of Shadow Keep

name: Shadow Militiaman Set
location_text: Dropped by Shadow Militiaman enemies in Shadow Keep

name: St. Trina's Blossom
location_text: Found in the Garden of Deep Purple after completing Thiollier's quest

name: Thiollier's Set
location_text: Drops if you CAN summon during the final boss by progressing his quest

name: Verdigris Set
location_text: Drops at the end of Moore' questline

name: Winged Serpent Helm
location_text: Dropped from the Fire Knight outside of Messmer's Boss Room

name: Ansbach's Set
location_text: Recieved if you side with Ansbach against Leda and summon him during the final boss

name: Young Lion's Set
location_text: Purchase at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn. Good Luck!

name: Leda's Armor
location_text: Reward after defeating Miquella's Allies

name: Soiled Loincloth
location_text: Dropped by Hornset when invaded near Rauh Ancient Ruins Site of Grace
